Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class MainSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.MainSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainSceneController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The controller associated with the GUI's main scene and employed in its management.
